name: Vaultwarden
short_description: Lightweight Bitwarden server for password management.
description: Lightweight Bitwarden server for password management. Vaultwarden is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, security, password-manager, privacy. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Vaultwarden on your home server to lightweight bitwarden server for password management without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Vaultwarden to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
